content: row 9 and all odd row will end with an increase increase q row 10 and all even row will be the same number of stiches from the previous row no increases on these row q work to row 85 or until neckline edge equals 21 inches 53 34 cm see page 5 for schematic q you should have approximately 54 stitches across the 85th row for larger sizes continue working until angled edge reaches desired length q crochet the next 10 row without increasing each row should be 54 stitches across 54 q pull yarn through the last loop to finish off leave a long tail at least 6 -10 inches q using the yarn needle sew the seaming edge to the beginning row creating a closed bandana q knot and sew in ends for personal use only all rights reserved by 5 bzypeach schematic starting point row 1 2 5cm for personal use only all rights reserved by 6 bzypeach direction of crocheting seaming edge 2 5cm neckline edge 21 53 34 cm call to action we will not stand on the sidelines in 2020 and beyond we are at a pivotal moment in our country and we need to be actively engaged in politics we will stand united and ready to fight for our rights and the rights of others we will crochet the empower vote november 3rd people bandana & wear it proudly while speaking against injustice attending gatherings marching voting post a picture on instagram and tag it with #empowerpeople #purplebandana for additional information knit pattern sewing pattern and more visit pattern questions email https //empowerpeople bzypeach@yahoo com 2020 com 💚🍑 for personal use only all rights reserved by 7 bzypeach
